mapper.insert: insert into error ( error_id, project_id, city, province, ip, page_url, sdk_version, type, time, user_id, uuid, record_screen_id, line_number, column_number, error_msg, error_stack, device_info, bread_crumb ) values ( #{errorId}, #{apiKey}, #{city}, #{province}, #{ip}, #{pageUrl}, #{sdkVersion}, #{type}, #{time}, #{userId}, #{routeId}, #{recordScreenId}, #{lineNumber}, #{columnNumber}, #{errorMsg}, #{errorStack}, #{deviceInfo}, #{breadCrumb, typeHandler=com.amc.typeHandler.ListTypeHandler, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
